Braveheart is a historical drama that tells the story of William Wallace, a Scottish warrior who led a rebellion against the English in the 13th century.

(C) The Good Son is a psychological thriller that follows a young boy who becomes increasingly violent and dangerous. It does not share any common themes or genres with the other options.

(A) Dances with Wolves
